title: Backend Developer
description: Develops and maintains the server-side logic of web applications.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Implements the user interface and user experience of web applications.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Works on both the frontend and backend of web applications.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Creates applications for mobile devices on iOS or Android.

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: Designs and develops software for embedded systems and devices.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Works on automating and streamlining the software development and deployment process.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Designs, builds, and manages cloud-based infrastructure and services.

title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
description: Ensures the reliability, scalability, and performance of production systems.

title: Systems Engineer
description: Manages and maintains computer systems and networks.

title: Data Engineer
description: Builds and manages data pipelines and infrastructure for data-intensive applications.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Designs and develops machine learning models and systems.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes and interprets complex data to help organizations make better decisions.

title: AI/ML Ops Engineer
description: Manages the operationalization of AI and machine learning models.

title: Security Engineer
description: Protects computer systems and networks from security threats.

title: Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer
description: Tests software to ensure it meets quality standards.

title: Automation Engineer
description: Designs and develops automated tests and testing frameworks.

title: Solutions Engineer / Sales Engineer
description: Provides technical expertise and support to the sales process.

title: Technical Product Manager
description: Defines the product vision and strategy from a technical perspective.

title: Business Intelligence (BI) Developer
description: Designs and develops BI solutions, including reports, dashboards, and data models.

title: Game Developer
description: Creates video games for various platforms.

title: Product Manager (PM)
description: Owns the product vision, roadmaps, and cross-team alignment.

title: Program Manager
description: Oversees multiple projects, aligning business goals with execution.

title: Business Analyst
description: Translates business needs into actionable requirements and works with dev teams.

title: Operations Manager
description: Optimizes workflows, resource planning, and performance metrics.

title: Technical Recruiter
description: Bridges hiring teams and candidates. Your engineering background makes you credible.

title: Sales Engineer / Pre-Sales Consultant
description: Explains complex tech products in business terms.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: SEO, social media strategy, and campaign optimization.

title: Customer Success Manager (CSM)
description: Ensures clients achieve value, driving retention.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Focuses on user journeys and visual storytelling.

title: Innovation Program Manager
description: Drives company-wide ideation sessions, hackathons, and experimental pilots.

title: Corporate Development Associate
description: Supports mergers, acquisitions, and strategic partnerships.

title: Organizational Development Specialist
description: Shapes company culture, workflows, and employee engagement strategies.

title: Chief of Staff (Executive Track)
description: Works directly with executives to manage priorities, analyze decisions, and ensure alignment across teams.

title: Brand Strategist
description: Defines brand positioning and storytelling for companies or products.

title: Creative Director (Tech Companies)
description: Oversees the creative vision for campaigns, visuals, and branding.

title: Venture Capital Analyst
description: Evaluates startups, market sizing, and investment potential.

title: Instructional Designer
description: Develops course materials for e-learning platforms.

title: Sustainability Consultant
description: Advises businesses on reducing carbon footprints.

title: Creative Technologist
description: Combines art, design, and emerging tech for installations or products.
